select customerId,appId,nickName,headPortraitUrl,sex,type,age
,IFNULL(fs.attention_state,0) AS attentionStatus, (IFNULL(fs.attention_state,0))&(IFNULL(fs1.attention_state,0)) AS eachAttentionStatus
from ( select customer_id AS customerId, app_id AS appId, nick_name AS nickName, head_portrait_url AS headPortraitUrl, sex, (case when v_status=2 then 1 else 0 end ) as type, (YEAR (NOW()) - YEAR (birthday)) AS age from customer
nick_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and customer_id != #{customerId}
and app_id not in(1,2,3,4)
order by (case when nick_name = #{keyword} then 1 when nick_name like concat(#{keyword},'%') then 2 when nick_name like concat('%',#{keyword}) then 3 when nick_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') then 4 else 0 end ) ) cus_temp
LEFT JOIN fans fs ON fs.anchor_id = cus_temp.customerId and fs.fans_id = #{customerId} LEFT JOIN fans fs1 ON fs.anchor_id = fs1.fans_id and fs1.anchor_id = fs.fans_id
LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
